CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SOURCE_STREET_ADDRESS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.18.492374000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_line_1_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_2_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_3_txt IN VARCHAR2
,city_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,country_cd IN VARCHAR2
,postal_code_txt IN VARCHAR2
,carrier_route_txt IN VARCHAR2
,clean_street_address_id IN NUMBER
,clean_po_box_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_line_1_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_2_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_3_txt IN VARCHAR2
,city_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,country_cd IN VARCHAR2
,postal_code_txt IN VARCHAR2
,carrier_route_txt IN VARCHAR2
,clean_street_address_id IN NUMBER
,clean_po_box_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_street_address_id IN NUMBER
,address_line_1_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_2_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_3_txt IN VARCHAR2
,city_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,country_cd IN VARCHAR2
,postal_code_txt IN VARCHAR2
,carrier_route_txt IN VARCHAR2
,clean_street_address_id IN NUMBER
,clean_po_box_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (

,source_street_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_source_street_address;

body.name: DA_SOURCE_STREET_ADDRESS
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SOURCE_STREET_ADDRESS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.18.504492000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_line_1_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_2_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_3_txt IN VARCHAR2
,city_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,country_cd IN VARCHAR2
,postal_code_txt IN VARCHAR2
,carrier_route_txt IN VARCHAR2
,clean_street_address_id IN NUMBER
,clean_po_box_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_source_street_address.add(fx), parms=' || address_line_1_txt || '|' || address_line_2_txt || '|' || address_line_3_txt || '|' || city_nm || '|' || territory_cd || '|' || country_cd || '|' || postal_code_txt || '|' || carrier_route_txt || '|' || clean_street_address_id || '|' || clean_po_box_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_source_street_address a
(
a.source_street_address_id
,a.address_line_1_txt
,a.address_line_2_txt
,a.address_line_3_txt
,a.city_nm
,a.territory_cd
,a.country_cd
,a.postal_code_txt
,a.carrier_route_txt
,a.clean_street_address_id
,a.clean_po_box_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_source_street_address_id.NEXTVAL
,add.address_line_1_txt
,add.address_line_2_txt
,add.address_line_3_txt
,add.city_nm
,add.territory_cd
,add.country_cd
,add.postal_code_txt
,add.carrier_route_txt
,add.clean_street_address_id
,add.clean_po_box_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.source_street_address_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_source_street_address.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,address_line_1_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_2_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_3_txt IN VARCHAR2
,city_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,country_cd IN VARCHAR2
,postal_code_txt IN VARCHAR2
,carrier_route_txt IN VARCHAR2
,clean_street_address_id IN NUMBER
,clean_po_box_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_source_street_address.add, parms=' || address_line_1_txt || '|' || address_line_2_txt || '|' || address_line_3_txt || '|' || city_nm || '|' || territory_cd || '|' || country_cd || '|' || postal_code_txt || '|' || carrier_route_txt || '|' || clean_street_address_id || '|' || clean_po_box_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_source_street_address a
(
a.source_street_address_id
,a.address_line_1_txt
,a.address_line_2_txt
,a.address_line_3_txt
,a.city_nm
,a.territory_cd
,a.country_cd
,a.postal_code_txt
,a.carrier_route_txt
,a.clean_street_address_id
,a.clean_po_box_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_source_street_address_id.NEXTVAL
,add.address_line_1_txt
,add.address_line_2_txt
,add.address_line_3_txt
,add.city_nm
,add.territory_cd
,add.country_cd
,add.postal_code_txt
,add.carrier_route_txt
,add.clean_street_address_id
,add.clean_po_box_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_source_street_address.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_street_address_id IN NUMBER
,address_line_1_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_2_txt IN VARCHAR2
,address_line_3_txt IN VARCHAR2
,city_nm IN VARCHAR2
,territory_cd IN VARCHAR2
,country_cd IN VARCHAR2
,postal_code_txt IN VARCHAR2
,carrier_route_txt IN VARCHAR2
,clean_street_address_id IN NUMBER
,clean_po_box_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_source_street_address.add, parms=' || source_street_address_id || '|' || address_line_1_txt || '|' || address_line_2_txt || '|' || address_line_3_txt || '|' || city_nm || '|' || territory_cd || '|' || country_cd || '|' || postal_code_txt || '|' || carrier_route_txt || '|' || clean_street_address_id || '|' || clean_po_box_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_source_street_address a
(
a.source_street_address_id
,a.address_line_1_txt
,a.address_line_2_txt
,a.address_line_3_txt
,a.city_nm
,a.territory_cd
,a.country_cd
,a.postal_code_txt
,a.carrier_route_txt
,a.clean_street_address_id
,a.clean_po_box_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.source_street_address_id
,add.address_line_1_txt
,add.address_line_2_txt
,add.address_line_3_txt
,add.city_nm
,add.territory_cd
,add.country_cd
,add.postal_code_txt
,add.carrier_route_txt
,add.clean_street_address_id
,add.clean_po_box_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_source_street_address.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_street_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_source_street_address.del, parms=' || source_street_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_source_street_address a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.source_street_address_id = del.source_street_address_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_source_street_address.del');

END del;

END da_source_street_address;
